text: - My name is Fiona,
I'm a solution architect for AWS,

for power, utilities,
manufacturing and automotive.

I've been working in
IoT for around 25 years.

I never had cloud experience
before joining AWS.

It's not a uniquely a
specific set of skills.

Everyone that bring
their own unique skills
for our customers.
We work with customers

the day to day to try to solve
their business challenges.
I think diversity is very important for me

and diversity comes in
two different areas.

The diversity we have from
all support and services
and the diversity we have from the people.

There is quite activities
that you can get involved
as a part of your day to day job.

There's two particular one
that I feel quite proud.
One of them is Re/Start.
Re/Start is a program that we have at AWS

for under employed and
underprivileged individuals
to enable those into cloud skills.

And the second thing that
we feel quite passionate

is our Glamazon is LGBTQ
teams inside layers

with the diversity activities
to increase the visibility now
to different diverse set individuals.
